pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 13, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 13, 2016:

Fort McMurray, Alberta

In the morning, the Prime Minister will visit Fort McMurray and will meet with first responders.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled media coverage only


Edmonton, Alberta

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with Alberta Premier Rachel Notley.

Provincial Operations Centre
14515-122 Ave NW
Edmonton, Alberta               

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage


Please note: all times are local

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
